name: include-fussball-de-widgets
description: A WordPress plugin for easy integration of fussball.de widgets.
author: IT-Service Böhm -- Alexander Böhm

scripts.dev: npm run clear && npm run build && npm run i18n && @powershell -Command ./tasks/cp-dev-release.ps1
scripts.i18n:pot: wp i18n make-pot app/dist app/languages/include-fussball-de-widgets.pot --slug=include-fussball-de-widgets --domain=include-fussball-de-widgets --package-name="Include Fussball.de Widgets"
scripts.i18n: npm run i18n:json && npm run i18n:copy
scripts.release:github: cpr ./app/dist/ .github-releases/include-fussball-de-widgets -d && cd .github-releases/ && bestzip include-fussball-de-widgets-v3.0.2.zip include-fussball-de-widgets && rimraf include-fussball-de-widgets && cd ..
scripts.release: npm run release:copy && npm run release:github
